name: "MovE"
description:
Play AR game in a unique way.
Move your hands slowly to guide a ball using laser pointer in the game.

Discover new mechanics, solve puzzles and enjoy use of Real Light for the first time in a game!

Features:
- 40+ challenging levels
- Unique controls
- Real light sensing puzzles
- Original music
- Sync with iCloud
- NO control buttons, swipes or any other gestures in gameplay

Hold your breath... Keep your hands steady... and MovE the ball :)
